Episodes.Title: The Day Before
Episodes.Writer: Brian K. Vaughan, Pia Guerra, Eliza Clark
Episodes.Actors: Diane Lane, Ashley Romans, Ben Schnetzer
Episodes.Plot: On the eve of the worst crisis in human history, Congresswoman Jennifer Brown clashes with the President. Her children Yorick and Hero reach an emotional crossroads. None of them know their lives are about to change forever.

Episodes.Title: Would the World Be Kind
Episodes.Writer: Brian K. Vaughan, Pia Guerra, Eliza Clark
Episodes.Actors: Diane Lane, Ashley Romans, Ben Schnetzer
Episodes.Plot: After a mass casualty event wipes out every creature with a Y chromosome, President Jennifer Brown responds to the crisis. Yorick fears he may be the only survivor. Hero attempts to right a wrong.

Episodes.Title: Neil
Episodes.Writer: Brian K. Vaughan, Pia Guerra, Eliza Clark
Episodes.Actors: Diane Lane, Ashley Romans, Ben Schnetzer
Episodes.Plot: With Jennifer and Yorick reunited, Agent 355 pitches a plan for what comes next. The dead President's daughter, Kimberly, circles Jennifer's secret. Meanwhile, Nora Brady and her daughter Mack say goodbye to home.

Episodes.Title: Karen and Benji
Episodes.Writer: Brian K. Vaughan, Pia Guerra, Eliza Clark
Episodes.Actors: Diane Lane, Ashley Romans, Ben Schnetzer
Episodes.Plot: On Jennifer's orders, Yorick and Agent 355 search for a geneticist who can unravel the mystery of how he survived. Meanwhile, Hero and Sam encounter a dangerous group of women.

Episodes.Title: Mann Hunt
Episodes.Writer: Brian K. Vaughan, Pia Guerra, Eliza Clark
Episodes.Actors: Diane Lane, Ashley Romans, Ben Schnetzer
Episodes.Plot: Yorick and Agent 355 search for Dr. Allison Mann in war-torn Boston. Back in D.C., Jennifer hides the truth about Yorick from her political rivals.

Episodes.Title: Weird Al Is Dead
Episodes.Writer: Brian K. Vaughan, Pia Guerra, Eliza Clark
Episodes.Actors: Diane Lane, Ashley Romans, Ben Schnetzer
Episodes.Plot: Yorick, Agent 355 and Dr. Mann hit a snag on their way to San Francisco. Jennifer clashes with former cabinet secretary Regina Oliver. Hero is seduced by a charismatic leader as Sam and Nora grapple with a dangerous group of survi...

Episodes.Title: My Mother Saw a Monkey
Episodes.Writer: Brian K. Vaughan, Pia Guerra, Eliza Clark
Episodes.Actors: Diane Lane, Ashley Romans, Ben Schnetzer
Episodes.Plot: Kimberly uncovers a secret. 355 and Allison reach an understanding. Yorick stumbles on a mysterious town where things are not what they seem.

Episodes.Title: Ready. Aim. Fire.
Episodes.Writer: Brian K. Vaughan, Pia Guerra, Eliza Clark
Episodes.Actors: Diane Lane, Ashley Romans, Ben Schnetzer
Episodes.Plot: Tensions at the PriceMax spiral out of control. Hero and Sam pass the point of no return. Nora uncovers dangerous secrets.

Episodes.Title: Peppers
Episodes.Writer: Brian K. Vaughan, Pia Guerra, Eliza Clark
Episodes.Actors: Diane Lane, Ashley Romans, Ben Schnetzer
Episodes.Plot: As tensions at the Pentagon come to a head, Jennifer faces a new, surprising threat. Meanwhile, the Amazons hit the road.

Episodes.Title: Victoria
Episodes.Writer: Brian K. Vaughan, Pia Guerra, Eliza Clark
Episodes.Actors: Diane Lane, Ashley Romans, Ben Schnetzer
Episodes.Plot: As the Amazons close in on Marrisville, Nora reaches a breaking point. Yorick makes a new connection while 355 faces her past.
